question: How many wives and children each of the Khulfa-e-Rashideen had?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Hadhrat Abu Bakr (Radhiallaahu Anhu) - 4 wives, 6 children.
Hadhrat Umar (Radhiallaahu Anhu) - 7 wives, 8 children
Hadhrat Ali (Radhiallaahu Anhu) - 9 wives, 31 children
Hadhrat Uthmaan (Radhiallaahu Anhu) - 9 wives, 16 children.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
